item.title: Ubuntu Network config using netplan
item.description: Ubuntu Netplan complete example /etc/netplan/template.txt # -------------------------- # Static IP Address Example # -------------------------- network: version: 2 renderer: networkd ethernets: eth0: dhcp4: no dhcp6: no addresses: [172.16.57.999/24] gateway4: 172.16.57.1 nameservers: addresses: [172.16.57.5,172.16.57.8] # -------------------------- # DHCP IP Address Example # -------------------------- network: version: 2 renderer: networkd ethernets: eth0: dhcp4: yes # -------------------------- # TRUNK interface example # -------------------------- network: version: 2 ethernets: eth0: addresses: - 172.16.57.999/24 gateway4: 172.16.57.1 nameservers: addresses: [172.
